Privacy policy

This Privacy Policy explains how information about you is collected, used and disclosed by dota2india.com (hereafter “dota2india.com”, “our,” “we,” or “us”). This Privacy Policy applies to information we collect when you use or visit our website, mobile applications and other online services (collectively, the “dota2india.com”) or when you otherwise interact with us. dota2india.com values the privacy of users, subscribers, members, viewers, and others who visit and use the dota2india.com (collectively or individually, “you” or “users”) and wants you to be familiar with how we collect, use, and disclose personal information from and about you.

By using the dota2india.com, you expressly consent to the information handling practices described in this Privacy Policy. 

Please read the following carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data and how we will treat it. By visiting dota2india.com (the “Website”), you are accepting and consenting to the practices described in this policy as well as consenting to our use of cookies in accordance with the terms of this policy.

  1. Collection of Information.
  2. Information You Provide to Us.

dota2india.com collects information that you provide directly to us. For example, we collect information when you register or update the details of your account.

The types of information we may collect include your name, email address, account password, telephone number, postal address including city, state and zip code.

Additionally, we will collect and process the following data:

  • information users provide by filling in any details on the Website or by corresponding with us by phone, e-mail or otherwise.
  • information we collect about you regarding each of your visits to our Website. We will automatically collect the following information:
  • technical information which may include: the Internet protocol (IP) address used to connect your computer to the Internet; browser type and version; time zone setting; browser plug-in types and versions and the operating system and platform.
  • information about your visit, including the full Uniform Resource Locators (URL), clickstream to, through and from our Website (including date and time), page response times, download errors, length of visits to certain pages, page interaction information (such as scrolling, clicks, and mouse-overs), methods used to browse away from the page, and any name, email address or phone number used to contact us.
  • Name and email address with regards to being able to contact you either with respect to answering a query or for more general reasons concerned with informing you about our services and general marketing information.
  1. Information We Collect Automatically When You Use the dota2india.com. When you access or use dota2india.com, we may automatically collect information about you, including please review the following: Internet Protocol address (“IP Address”), a unique user ID, device and browser types and identifiers, referring and exit page addresses, software and system type, location information from your computer or mobile device, and information about your usage of dota2india.com, analytics, including but not limited to customer, and other demographics. Examples of how dota2india.com uses automatically collected information include to: (1) automatically update the dota2india.com on your system; (2) provide customized advertisements, content, and information; (3) monitor the effectiveness of marketing campaigns; (4) monitor and store aggregate site usage metrics such as total number of visitors and pages accessed.

Your personal data shall not be kept for longer than is necessary although it is not possible for us to always specify in advance how long this may be for. Notwithstanding the above, we may retain your personal data if it is necessary for our compliance with certain legal obligations.

  1. Location Information:If you consent to the collection of location information from your computer or mobile device, we may collect this information when you access or use dota2india.com, or when you otherwise consent to the collection of this information. We may also use your IP Address to infer an approximate geographic location for your computer or device. For more details, please see “Your Choices” below.
  2. Information Collected by Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies:We use various technologies to collect information, and this may include sending cookies to your computer or mobile device. Cookies are small data files stored on your hard drive or in device memory that helps us to improve dota2india.com and your experience, see which areas and features of the dota2india.com are popular and count visits. We may also collect information using web beacons (also known as “gifs,” “pixel tags” and “tracking pixels”). Web beacons are electronic images that may be used in dota2india.com or emails and help deliver cookies, count visits, understand usage and campaign effectiveness and determine whether an email has been opened and acted upon. For more information about cookies, and how to disable them, please see “Your Choices” below.

Users acknowledge the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we will do our best to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee the security of your data transmitted to our Website; any transmission is at your own risk. Once we have received your information, we will use strict procedures and security features to try to prevent unauthorized access.

  1. Information from Other Sources: We may obtain information about you from third parties and sources other than dota2india.com, such as advertisers or social media networks such as Facebook for which you have approved our access. When you access dota2india.com through social media networks or when you connect dota2india.com to social media networks, you are authorizing us to collect, store, and use such information and content in accordance with this Privacy Policy. We may also obtain information from third-party services regarding your use of such services. If we combine or associate information from other sources with information that we collect through dota2india.com, we will treat the combined information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. In addition, we may use third party services such as Google Analytics that collect, monitor and analyze this type of information.
  1. Use of Information. dota2india.com uses information about you for various purposes, including as set forth herein.
  2. dota2india.com uses such information to operate, maintain, enhance, provide, create, and develop all of the features, functionality, and services (new or existing) found on dota2india.com, including but not limited to User Content. We will improve your experience with dota2india.com by delivering content, advertising and marketing messages; create and maintain a trusted and safer environment on dota2india.com, including through the detection and prevention of fraud, unauthorized access, intrusion, and service interruption; allow you to search, comment on content, and participate in online contests, or rewards programs
  1. dota2india.com may periodically send promotional materials or notifications to you related to dota2india.com.
  2. dota2india.com is based in India and the information we collect is governed by Indian law. By accessing or using dota2india.com or otherwise providing information to us, you consent to the processing and transfer of information in and to India and other countries, where you may not have the same rights and protections as you do under local law.
  3. Sharing of Information. We may share information about you as follows or as otherwise described in this Privacy Policy:
  • dota2india.com does not share information that can identify you personally with third parties for their marketing or promotional uses without your consent with the public on dota2india.com.
  • We may disclose such information to service providers working on our behalf, such as, to: provide website hosting, maintenance, and security services; fulfill orders; conduct data analysis and create reports; offer certain functionality; or assist us in improving dota2india.com and creating new services and features. We require that these parties process such information in compliance with this Privacy Policy, we authorize them to use the information only for the purposes for which it is provided to them, and we require them to use reasonable confidentiality measures.
  • dota2india.com may disclose user information if we believe in good faith that such disclosure is necessary to comply with Indian state and federal laws or other applicable laws around the world (for example, in the country of your residence), or respond to a court order, judicial or other government request, subpoena, or warrant in the manner legally required.
  • dota2india.com also reserves the right to disclose information that we believe, in good faith, is appropriate or necessary to protect dota2india.com from potential liability or from fraudulent, abusive, or unlawful uses; investigate and defend ourselves against third-party claims, or allegations; protect the security or integrity of dota2india.com; or protect the rights, property, or safety of dota2india.com, our users, or others.
  • If we believe your actions are inconsistent with the spirit or language of our user agreements or policies, or to protect the rights, property and safety of dota2india.com or others.
  • Between and among dota2india.com, and its current and future parents, affiliates, subsidiaries, and other companies under common control and ownership; and
  • With your consent or at your direction, including if we notify you through dota2india.com that the information you provide will be shared in a particular manner and you provide such information.
  • We may also share aggregated or de-identified information, which cannot reasonably be used to identify you.
  1. Advertising and Analytics Services Provided by Others. We may allow others to serve advertisements on our behalf across the Internet and to provide analytics services. These entities may use cookies, web beacons and other technologies to collect information about your use ofdota2india.com and other websites and online services, including your IP address, web browser, pages viewed, time spent on pages, links clicked and conversion information. This information may be used by us and others to, among other things, analyze and track data, determine the popularity of certain content, deliver advertising and content targeted to your interests on dota2india.com and other websites and online services, and better understand your online activity. For more information about interest-based ads, or to opt out of having your web browsing information used for behavioral advertising purpose.
  2. Security. dota2india.com takes reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration and destruction. These measures may vary based on the sensitivity of your information. However, no security precautions or systems can be completely secure. We cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information you transmit to dota2india.com, and you do so at your own risk. dota2india.com cannot guarantee that such information may not be accessed, disclosed, altered, or destroyed by breach of any our physical, technical, or managerial safeguards, loss of data, or Force Majeure Event as described in the Terms of Service.
  3. Cookies.Most web browsers are set to accept cookies by default. If you prefer, you can usually choose to set your browser to remove or reject browser cookies. Removing or rejecting browser cookies does not necessarily affect third party flash cookies used in connection with dota2india.com. To delete or disable flash cookies please visit www.adobe.com/products/flashplayer/security for more information. Please note that if you choose to remove or reject cookies, this could affect the availability and functionality of dota2india.com.


Our Website uses cookies to distinguish users of our Website. This helps us to provide you with a good experience when you browse our Website and allows us to improve our Website. A cookie will be stored on your computer. Generally, cookies work by assigning to your computer a unique number that has no meaning outside of the Website. The cookies do not contain any personal information and we use them to only to personalize and improve your experience.

Our Website uses cookies to distinguish you from other users of our Website however, it does not identify you personally. This helps us to provide you with a good experience when you browse our Website and also allows us to improve our site. By continuing to browse the site, you are agreeing to our use of cookies.

Cookies used on our Website are essential cookies required for the operation of our Website, and cookies that allow us to monitor user behavior on our Website. Users can block cookies by activating the setting on your browser that allows you to refuse the setting of all or some cookies. If you use your browser settings to block all cookies (including essential cookies) you may not be able to access all or parts of our Website. Except for essential cookies, all cookies will expire after two year.

  1. Children’s Privacy. IF YOU ARE UNDER 13 YEARS OF AGE, THEN PLEASE DO NOT USE OR ACCESS dota2india.com AT ANY TIME OR IN ANY MANNER.

Protecting the privacy of young children is especially important. For that reason, dota2india.com does not knowingly collect or maintain personal information from persons under 13 years-of-age. If dota2india.com learns that personal information of persons under 13-years-of-age has been collected on or through dota2india.com, dota2india.com will take appropriate steps to delete this information. If you are the parent or legal guardian of a child under 13 who has become a dota2india.com user or member, then please contact dota2india.com using our contact form to have that child’s account terminated and personal information deleted.

  1. Changes and Updates to this Privacy Policy. dota2india.com reserves the right to change, modify, add, or remove portions of this Privacy Policy at any time (for example to reflect updates to dota2india.com or to reflect changes in the law).
  2. Questions and Comments. If you’d like to provide feedback to us about this Privacy Policy, or if you have any questions, please contact us using the contact us form..

Users acknowledge the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we will do our best to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee the security of your data transmitted to our Website; any transmission is at your own risk. Once we have received your information, we will use strict procedures and security features to try to prevent unauthorized access.
